title: Sec. Julián Castro
description: Samantha Bee talks to former HUD Secretary Julián Castro about his friendship with Elizabeth Warren, turning Texas blue, and the future of the Democratic Party--and get this--he is...hopeful?
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
